ComicInfo.Title: Cobra World Order Part Seven
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra World Order Part Seven: Destro survives the destruction of the Silent Castle, albeit by losing his forearms. Zartan's followers are spared from Cobra Commander's revenge by Tomax & Xamot, who are upset at how Cobra Commander has treated their Crimson Guard. Duke recalls how before he joined G.I. Joe he was part of an attempt to rescue Claire in Trucial Abysmia but Claire tried to help an injured soldier and was recaptured. Cobra Commander throws a 'Cobra World Order' parade in Springfield.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 02:23:34. [CVDB514467] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:40:01. [Issue ID 1532608]
